description.value: Popular with long-term visitors to Hibb, this cybernetic chip does only one thing; as a swift action, or as a reaction when you would be affected by a scent-based effect, you can choose to lose your sense of smell. You lose any abilities dependent on scent but become immune to sense-dependent effects that rely on scent. You can deactivate the anosmatic shunt and regain your sense of smell as a swift action.
